conversation.message: Hello School_C admissions team—I'm Student_B. School_C is one of my top choices, and I’m excited about the academic environment and opportunities your school offers. I would like to formally apply and would be ready to commit if accepted. [APPLY]

School_C ranks me 1st, giving me an excellent chance to secure a high-ranked option immediately. Since School_C is my 3rd choice and likely attainable, I will apply now to lock in a strong match rather than risk ending up lower later.

conversation.message:

With quota 1 and no other applicants this round, accepting Student_B immediately secures our top-choice match and eliminates any risk of losing them to School_A or School_B (both ranked above School_C in Student_B's preferences).
